# mirascope.integrations.otel


## Error Processing Documentation

An error occurred while generating documentation for `mirascope.integrations.otel.configure

## `with_otel``: Could not resolve alias mirascope.integrations.otel._utils.Tracer pointing at opentelemetry.trace.Tracer (in .api-generation-repos/mirascope-repo/mirascope/integrations/otel/_utils.py:13)

Please check that all required dependencies are installed.


<ApiType type="Alias" />

## Description

Wraps a Mirascope function with OpenTelemetry.

Example:

```python
from mirascope.core import anthropic, prompt_template
from mirascope.integrations.otel import with_otel, configure

configure()


def format_book(title: str, author: str) -> str:
    return f"{title} by {author}"


@with_otel()
@anthropic.call(model="claude-3-5-sonnet-20240620", tools=[format_book])
def recommend_book(genre: str) -> str:
    return f"Recommend a {genre} book"


print(recommend_book("fantasy"))
```

<ReturnType
  type="Callable[[Callable[_P, _R]], Callable[_P, _R]]"
  moduleContext="collections.abc"
  isBuiltin={false}
  contentSubpath="docs/mirascope"
  currentModule="mirascope.integrations.otel._with_otel"
/>


**Alias to:** `mirascope.integrations.otel._with_otel.with_otel`

<ApiType type="Alias" />

## Description

Decorator to wrap a function with hyperdx.

Example:

```python
import os

from mirascope.core import anthropic, prompt_template
from mirascope.integrations.otel import with_hyperdx

os.environ["HYPERDX_API_KEY"] = "YOUR_API_KEY"


def format_book(title: str, author: str):
    return f"{title} by {author}"


@with_hyperdx()
@anthropic.call(model="claude-3-5-sonnet-20240620", tools=[format_book])
def recommend_book(genre: str) -> str:
    return f"Recommend a {genre} book"


print(recommend_book("fantasy"))
```

  type="Callable[[Callable[_P, _R]], Callable[_P, _R]]"
  moduleContext="collections.abc"
  isBuiltin={false}
  contentSubpath="docs/mirascope"
  currentModule="mirascope.integrations.otel._with_hyperdx"
/>


**Alias to:** `mirascope.integrations.otel._with_hyperdx.with_hyperdx`
